review: fun

apart from some fatal error crashes now and then game is fantastic having tons of fun just exploring and blowing stuff up so much so im 12 hours in and im only on the 4th mission i dont like to compare eggs to eggs but the game plays very much like a modern spg game with absolutely fantastic graphics and combat

i really enjoyed this game and its a fun arcade space shooter the story is compelling enough and the combat and ships are varied i eventually had to just say i was done with side missions though i was getting bored of fly here do this rinse and repeat

this is one of if not the best space flight game ive ever played tye only thing that is not at the up is the stop motion videos but it hardly anything when the gameplay is so good 1010 worth every penny

1110 as someone who has played tens of thousands of hours between many different games over the years i can sincerely say that this game has by far the best lootgear system out of any game ive played my only gripe with this game which i have to admit is not a fair one is that it is not a first person shooter if you guys created a game with the same loot and similar combat system to this one in first person as a pve or single player game i would literally put a thousand hours into it

charming and wellmade game with wonderful visuals and music a significant improvement over the roguelite original and a treat for spaceflight rpg enjoyers if you feel dissuaded by the games looting mechanics dont be  your inventory and equipment is pretty tame in size and scope and upgrading is a straightforward draganddrop process with clear and helpful item comparison tooltips
simple fun relatively cheap buy it

lots of missions and distractions along the way to find sweet loots  better than i expected for sure   i thought it was going to be another space game cash grab but there is actually a game here so i was happy   this one was actually worth buying

everything i was looking for in a chill downtime game good rpg system imo good story that is new and im hooked good customization great soundtrack some other competitors out there didnt have the action i wanted exploring space sounds boring unless someone fully recreated the star wars star trek stargate universes shooty shooty in space is better
nice lowpressure lootershooter feels like a singleplayer eve only complaint is dialogue is a little stilted

great game to chill when you want to and to blow crap up when you need to interspersed with some puzzles that help break up any possible monotony good story too to keep you going to learn more  love it

i play on my rog ally x and it runs really well   freelancer meets diablo cant believe i slept on this game for so long it offers endless space combat with a wide variety of missions locations and ways to upgrade your ship theres always one more thing to do or unlock another wreck to explore and a fun story pushing things along
